ComicInfo.Series: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Too Long a Sacrifice
ComicInfo.Summary: Too Long a Sacrifice [Part 1]: When a bombing at a Promenade restaurant injuries members of different races, Odo is under pressure to find the perpetrator to prevent a diplomatic incident.
